dt: {bc}a fencing or dueling sword having a bowl-shaped guard and a rigid blade of triangular section with no cutting edge that tapers to a sharp point blunted for fencing {dx}compare {dxt|foil:4||1}, {dxt|saber||}{/dx}
{bc}the art or sport of fencing with the épée

shortdef: a fencing or dueling sword having a bowl-shaped guard and a rigid blade of triangular section with no cutting edge that tapers to a sharp point blunted for fencing
the art or sport of fencing with the épée
